chara.textHome:
I must've been about six years old when
the lady living next door lost her wallet,
and I remember helping her look for it.

I got involved with the neighborhood
association and volunteering after that...

People were calling me the "go-to helper"
or "troubleshooter" before I knew it.

Each day is a real challenge,
but I can't just turn people down.

I actually want to draw
my own comics someday.
Then, I'll create the perfect romance!
What?
I'll keep doing karate.

The lovestruck iron-fisted artist,
that'll be me!
Awesome! New record in the books!
Power's coursing through my veins!

Yeah... If I keep this up maybe I can
cut down on wasted movements!

Read the enemy and evade
at the last second!
That way, you can counter so much faster.
That said, I've still got a long way to go...

I've become able to somewhat read
my opponent's next moves by watching
the subtleties in their actions.
Well, in a vague sense I can.
That means I need to visualize more clearly!
Oh, you're just in time! I need some help!
Please! Mind lending me a hand?
Come on, this is me asking here!
Morning!
Every day starts with training!

Wanna join me?
Let's do it together.

It feels great to exercise
first thing in the morning!
You know, I made this bento myself.
Huh? What?
Don't look so surprised!
I can cook, you know!
As soon as I get home, I do lots of training.

A legendary swordsman once said...
It takes 1,000 days of training to learn the 
basics and 10,000 days to refine your skills.
So basically, I've still got lots to do!
This sure is a strong foe...
Ugh... I can barely get close...
Ahhh! Damn this...dumb homework!

I've got no idea what the answer is!
This is gonna take me forever!

As well as physical training, it's also 
important to visualize your strategies.

Whenever I have a free moment,
in my mind I'm always like...
Hiyah! Pow!
Hiyah! Pow!
I did it!
I did it!

I always follow through when I accept a job.
I never even think about running away...
It may not be easy sometimes,
but I can't walk away from my duties.

All battles must be taken seriously.
To not do so is disrespectful to your enemy.

I won't hold back!
I'm gonna give it my all!

My favorite attack has got to
be the roundhouse kick.

It feels so great when you
manage to land one of those!
Training can be tough at times.

But I know I'd regret it if I ran away, and
that's what gives me the drive to keep going.

It's always ideal to win with a
single deadly blow!

It's not easy to do, but it's what every karate
pupil aspires to.

It's nice to see a smile
when you fix a problem.

When I see someone get happy,
and that makes me happy too.

I've become physically stronger
since I became a Magical Girl,

so I hold back a bit when
I'm sparring in karate.
I wish I didn't have to do that, though...
Each favor I've been asked has been tough.

But they've given me a ton of
experience and taught me a lot.
I guess they're a part of me now.

Whenever I fight, I focus solely on
the enemy in front of me and
forget about everything else.
All I think of is winning.
A lot of strange stuff happens in Kamihama.
You hear so many weird rumors too.
For example, oh, what was it?
Oh, right!
The Ghost Flower Girl!
I like my school uniform. Why?
I get to wear a skirt because that's the rule!

Even my parents can't say
anything about that!
You better be ready!
Phew… We won this one!
Looks like a decisive defeat to me!
Sorry, but I'm gonna win this one!
Just like I imagined before the battle!
Yo! The name's Akira Shinobu!
Are you okay?
I'll listen if you need somebody to talk to.
That is, if you want me to...
I'll be even stronger tomorrow!
That's why I've gotta train hard today!
Yeah, that's it. Now to test it in battle!

So... This is like moving up
a belt rank, right?
Either way, feels great!
I love romance shows and dramas.

I guess they're kind of like a world
I could never be a part of even if I tried,
or maybe something I really long for...
Urgh... Now I'm sad...

I like to save up my allowance and buy
lots of cute little things...
without telling my parents.

Sometimes, I secretly peek at my collection
and just smile...

Hey! Don't back away
from me like that!
